title: spex - font

comments.content:
perhaps a riff on [colossalis](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220171830/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/colossalis-bq/black/)?

[HD](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220171830/http:/typophile.com/user/1520) is a typophile member. Might ask him directly.

That is definitely a custom job.

[Ariergard](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220171830/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/paratype/ariergard_heavy_ot/?sample_text=spex&sample_size=74) has the same feel, but definitely not the same characters.

To bad **HD** doesn’t have his contact link enabled. Although none of the “big wigs” on here do. (hehe)
oh, i actually meant the font that’s used in the copytext. i’m bad a recognizing fonts.
The serif heads are Centennial. Not sure if the copy is.

<cite>The serif heads are Centennial. Not sure if the copy is.</cite>

Yes, the body copy is [Centennial](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220171830/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/linotype_centennial_std_ot_virtual/), too,

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220171830im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/spex_3885.gif)
